content: I submitted two change requests relating to HealthcareService, 15625 and 15627, and I would like to make sure that I attend the conference call when they are brought up. Do you folks know when they might be on the agenda? I am aware that this WG has very pressing items up for balloting and that this may not be soon, I just want a rough idea- if possible. Thank you.
Thanks, will let you know when we put it on the agenda.

Is there a way GF#15625 and GF#15627 could be discussed prior to the September ballot? If not, when should I expect to have that discussion?

Thanks,
Keith
